translation.ja: “私を洗ってくだされば 雪より白くなる”

translation.en: Make me to hear joy and gladness,
translation.ja: “喜び祝う声を 聞かせてくだされば―”

translation.en: that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.
translation.ja: “あなたに打ち砕かれた 骨が喜ぶ”

translation.en: Hide thy face from my sins, and blot out all mine iniquities.
translation.ja: “私の罪に み顔を向けず 私の不義を拭ってください”

translation.en: Create in me a clean heart, O God,
translation.ja: “神よ 私の内に 清い心を創り―”

translation.en: and renew a right spirit within me."
translation.ja: “新しく正しい霊を 授けてください”

translation.en: -When last did you speak with her? -Yesterday.
translation.ja: 最後に話したのは？ 昨日です

translation.en: Before she went for the damn party. Now she's not responding to messages or returning my calls.
translation.ja: パーティーに行って以来 音信不通です

translation.en: Emeka, it's barely 24 hours. Give it some time before you begin to panic.
translation.ja: 24時間しか経ってないのに うろたえるな

translation.en: What if something has happened to her? The longer we wait, the worse her situation could get.
translation.ja: 彼女に何かあったのなら 一刻を争います

translation.en: I'm sure nothing has happened to her. She probably is just sleeping it off.
translation.ja: たぶん酔って 眠り込んでるだけさ

translation.en: Emeka, relax.
In the evening, go check the normal places. If you don't find her, then we'll know there's a problem.
translation.ja: 夜 彼女が現れなければ 問題発生と考えよう

translation.en: Sorry, sir, I don't think I can wait. If I have to, I'll go to that house and find out exactly what happened.
translation.ja: 潜入先の家に行き 何があったか突き止めます

translation.en: And what if, contrary to your expectations, nothing actually happened to her?
translation.ja: 何も起きてなかったら 一体 どうするんだ？

translation.en: You think she will appreciate you having blown her cover?
translation.ja: 潜入取材が台無しだぞ

translation.en: So this is where you are. I've been looking for you.
translation.ja: ここにいたのね　捜したのよ

translation.en: I have something for you.
What is that?
Take it and don't ask me questions.
It's your cash from the other night.
You should have heard the way Phillip spoke about you.
translation.ja: フィリップさんは ご満悦だわ

translation.en: Do you still want to go to Europe?
I may have space for you on my next trip.
translation.ja: メンバーに加えてやれるかも

translation.en: With the way you look, you're what we call "forza speciale."
translation.ja: メンバーに加えてやれるかも あんたなら “特別嬢”になれる

translation.en: What's that?
That means you won't walk the streets like a common whore.
translation.ja: 特別嬢なら 路上で客を探さなくていい

translation.en: You will be escorting VIPs. That is what I did.
translation.ja: 上客をエスコートするの 私も そうだった

translation.en: But if you want to go, you have to pay me.
translation.ja: でも― 渡欧したいなら まず お金を払って

translation.en: It will cost $1,200.
Yes?
Okay.
I'll call you.
I see you are still interfering in matters that do not concern you.
translation.ja: また余計なことをしてるな

translation.en: -Are you talking to me? -Yes, and you heard me.
translation.ja: 私に言ってる？ そうだ

translation.en: Don't interfere with my business.
Chuks, what are you saying?
translation.ja: チュクス 何言ってんの？

translation.en: Leave my babe.
Did you hear me?
-I didn't come here to visit your babe. -I believe you.
translation.ja: 見当違いよ 本当か？

translation.en: What's my business with your ugly babe?
Ugly? I'll show you what ugly is today.
translation.ja: 何だと？ 真のブサイクを教えてやる

translation.en: Be careful.
Listen, man, I'm not afraid of your muscles.
translation.ja: お前なんか怖くねえぞ

translation.en: Get out of my sight or I'll smack you.
What's your problem?
Better think before you get hurt.
Leave him.
Chuks...
I feel sorry for you, because your time has passed and you don't even realize it.
translation.ja: 聞きな あんたは お先真っ暗よ

translation.en: You're here living in analog mode while everyone else has gone digital.
translation.ja: 古臭い商売に しがみついてるもの

translation.en: Look, man, your time has passed. It's my time now.
translation.ja: 世の中は変わり 私の時代が来たわ

translation.en: There is nothing you have that I want because everything you touch is messed up.
translation.ja: 安心しな あんたのものなんて 何も欲しくない

translation.en: -Fuck you! -Fuck you!
translation.ja: くたばれ お前こそ

translation.en: -Motherfucker! -Fuck off.
What happened? What do you want?
Can we talk?
Come into my office.
Seems like you're finally thinking straight.
translation.ja: やっと利口になったな

translation.en: How?
I thought you wanted to become one of my girls.
Chuks, please, that's not what I came to discuss.
So what do you want?
Please... do you know anyone who can help me teach someone a lesson?
translation.ja: 汚れ仕事をしてくれる人を 誰か知ってる？

translation.en: I mean, I want them to hurt him badly.
translation.ja: ある人を懲らしめたいの

translation.en: Who's the target?
He is really important.
-How important? -He's a politician.
Hold on.
What's going on?
Can you or can't you?
Look, it's not that I can't...
translation.ja: 無理ってわけじゃねえが―

translation.en: but with the way these important men move about with security, it's a bad idea.
translation.ja: 連中は警護されてるから 手ごわいぞ

translation.en: Babe, you see...
any time an important man hurts you, you should accept it as work experience.
translation.ja: 大物に傷つけられても やり過ごせ

translation.en: Experience and lesson.
You can't hurt an important man.
You see...
If you were one of my girls, I would protect you...
translation.ja: 守ってやるぞ よしてよ

translation.en: The way you protect Blessing, right?
You know, in this game, many people act like the Mafia.
translation.ja: マフィアぶる連中は 多いけど―

translation.en: But these guys are the real Mafia.
translation.ja: 彼らは正真正銘の マフィアだぞ

translation.en: In fact, they started it.
So if I fuck up, they will kill me.
translation.ja: ヘマをすれば 俺は殺されちまう

translation.en: If you fuck with me, I'll have to kill you.
translation.ja: もしヘマをしやがったら― ぶっ殺す

translation.en: -Tony-- -Let me finish.
translation.ja: トニー 最後まで聞け

translation.en: If you tell me you have 15 babes,
translation.ja: 人数は15人だと お前から聞いて―

translation.en: and I tell them that there are 15 babes available...
it must be exactly 15 babes.
Alero.
Fifteen is fifteen,
not fourteen.
I have 15 babes.
Because I heard that one of your babes left.
translation.ja: 聞いた話では― １人減った

translation.en: Yes, but I don't-- I'll get another one.
translation.ja: そうだけど代わりの子がいる

translation.en: Let me see her.
This one is a forza speciale.
But she looks like trouble.
The pretty ones come with a lot of trouble.
translation.ja: 美人ほど よく問題を起こす

translation.en: I know.
Has she paid?
She will pay.
You sure?
Because you told me that you have 15 babes.
translation.ja: 人数は変更できないからな

translation.en: Fifteen has to be fifteen.
I'm sure she will pay.
Okay.
Hello, Mom. It's me, Linda.
translation.ja: もしもし リンダよ

translation.en: Hello, my child! How are things with you?
translation.ja: いとしい我が子ね 近況はどう？

translation.en: Everything's fine here.
Everything is working out for Beauty and me.
That's great news! Thanks for everything you're doing for your family.
translation.ja: 朗報だわ 心から感謝してるよ

translation.en: -Don’t worry about it. -Thank you.
translation.ja: いいのよ よくやった

translation.en: Well done.
I will continue to pray for you and your sister. Yes, mother.
translation.ja: あんたたち姉妹のため 祈り続けるわ

translation.en: -Is Beauty there? -Yes, she is.
translation.ja: ビューティーは？ いるわ

translation.en: -Beauty! -I'm coming!
translation.ja: ビューティー はい

translation.en: Come quickly. Your sister wants to talk to you.
She's coming.
-I'm here, Mom. -Your sister wants to talk to you.
Hello! Linda, how are you?
How are you, Beauty? Start getting ready. It's time to come to Lagos.
translation.ja: 元気？ ラゴスにいらっしゃい

translation.en: Okay, I hear you, I hear you.
I called my sister and told her I've paid all the money.
translation.ja: 支払いが済んだと 妹に伝えたら…

translation.en: You should have heard how happy she was!
She was just shouting, "Europe, Europe!"
translation.ja: “ヨーロッパ！”って 叫びまくってたわ

translation.en: Will you be able to come with us?
I don't know. It's a lot of money.
translation.ja: どうかな　すごい金額だもの

translation.en: That's true.
Which one of you is Ehi?
Her.
Some man is looking for you.
He's handsome.
How are you, mister?
Cut the bullshit. Why haven't you been answering my calls?
translation.ja: たわ言はよせ なぜ電話に出ないんだ？

translation.en: Do you want a hand job, blow job or full fuck?
translation.ja: 手コキ フェラ セックス どれがいい？

translation.en: Just enter the car.
Please.
Please.
What is going on?
Are you going to say something or not?
Only if you calm down. I really can't deal with anyone shouting right now.
translation.ja: 冷静に聞いてくれるなら話す

translation.en: Okay.
Òlòtūré,
what happened?
Nothing.
Did something happen at the party?
translation.ja: パーティーで何かあった？

translation.en: No.
Then why are you acting strange?
Because I am tired.
Staying awake all day and most of the night has that effect on you.
translation.ja: 夜更かしすれば しんどくもなるわ

translation.en: How was the party?
Just a party.
Rich people doing what they love to do.
translation.ja: 金持ちが好き放題してるの

translation.en: It's over. I need you back at work.
translation.ja: もう終わりにしろ 戻ってこい

translation.en: I met the trafficker. And she had agreed to take me to Europe.
translation.ja: 人身売買人が 渡欧させてくれる

translation.en: Well, that's...
That's great. That's what we wanted, right?
translation.ja: 見事に狙いどおりだな

translation.en: This story is not finished.
What are you talking about?
I am saying there is so much more to this story that needs to be told.
translation.ja: 世間に伝えるべきことが もっとあるわ

translation.en: So many people that need to be brought down.
translation.ja: 倒すべき人がたくさんいる

translation.en: Okay, that's it.
I don't know where this is coming from, or what it is, but it's not up for conversation anymore. You're off the story.
translation.ja: 何にこだわってるにせよ 君は このネタから離れろ

translation.en: Look, Emeka, this is no longer your story.
translation.ja: エメカ もう あなたのネタじゃない

translation.en: It is now my story.
And I will get to the end of it with or without you.
translation.ja: あなたなしでも やり遂げるわ

translation.en: Auntie Alero.
-Good afternoon. -Do I know you?
translation.ja: こんにちは あんた 誰？

translation.en: My name is Blessing.
I stay at Sandra's house with Ehi and Linda.
translation.ja: サンドラの所で エヒたちと生活を

translation.en: Aren't you Chuks' girl?
Yes, I am.
What do you want from me?
-I just want to improve my life. -No, no, no.
translation.ja: 人生を変えたい やめて　イヤよ

translation.en: I have already saved $200. I will make more soon.
translation.ja: 200ドルあるし もっと準備でき…

translation.en: Blessing, no.
I just want to improve my life a bit. To get to the next level, please.
translation.ja: お願い もっとマシな生活がしたいの

translation.en: I don't deal with girls that have pimps.
translation.ja: ポン引きのいる子はダメ

translation.en: And you know Chuks is crazy. So I just can't.
translation.ja: その男がイカれ野郎なら なおさらよ

translation.en: Don't mind that local whore!
translation.ja: あの売春婦は無視しな

translation.en: The motherfucker thought she could ruin my business?
translation.ja: 商売が台無しになるわ

translation.en: I will show that bitch that I'm the last bus stop.
translation.ja: あのウザい女に 思い知らせてやる

translation.en: Okay. Tomorrow.
We are leaving tomorrow.
Sorry I'm late.
-Where did you go? -I went to the market.
translation.ja: どこへ？ 市場に行ってた

translation.en: I didn't know it would take so long. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 意外と時間が かかっちゃったわ

translation.en: Chuks, is something wrong?
You know...
I thought you and I had a deep connection.
translation.ja: お前とは強い絆で 結ばれてると思ってた

translation.en: Of course, we do. I know we have a deep connection.
translation.ja: 私たちは― 一心同体よ

translation.en: Are you sure?
Of course I'm sure.
Are you really sure?
Yes, of course.
Why are you asking me all these questions?
Because if you and I really have a deep connection,
you wouldn't have gone to beg Alero to take you to Europe.
translation.ja: アレロを頼るわけねえ 渡欧の件でな

translation.en: Chuks, please.
Don't worry.
Don't worry.
I know you won't do it again.
translation.ja: 二度とアレロを 頼れなくしてやる

translation.en: Stupid, stupid, stupid!
Take off this wig.
Stupid!
-Beauty! -Linda!
translation.ja: ビューティー！ 姉さん

translation.en: Where's your bag?
Come. Which one?
Were you tired?
Look at you! How's Mom?
translation.ja: 着飾ってるわね 母さんは元気？

translation.en: Mom is fine.
Please.
Come back to me.
I will.
I want you to keep this for me.
What's this?
It's my report
of everything that has happened while I've been in the house.
translation.ja: 潜入中のことを 全部 記してる

translation.en: I should get going.
Quick, quick, quick.
Auntie Alero, this is my sister I told you about.
Get on the bus. Quick, quick, quick.
translation.ja: さっさとバスに乗って

translation.en: -Get on the bus. Quick, quick, quick. -Get on.
Move.
Wait. I don't understand.
translation.ja: 一体 どういうこと？

translation.en: I thought he had good grades in school.
But there was no money to finish school.
No money? What happened to all the money I sent home?
translation.ja: 家にお金を 送ってあげたでしょ

translation.en: It was used to buy food. It didn't even last long.
translation.ja: 何とか食べていくので 精いっぱいだったわ

translation.en: Don't worry.
Once we reach Europe, we'll send more money home.
translation.ja: ヨーロッパから もっと送金しましょ

translation.en: Yeah?
Come.
Chuks is an old-fashioned pimp
translation.ja: ポン引きのチュクスは

translation.en: who is fast becoming redundant in the modern world.
translation.ja: 不要な存在になりつつある

translation.en: Years ago, he would've had many girls.
translation.ja: 昔は多くの女性を 仕切っただろう

translation.en: But times have changed with the Internet, and apps like Lover's Zone
translation.ja: 今ではネットや 出会い系アプリに―

translation.en: have replaced men like him.
But desperation creates danger,
translation.ja: 切羽詰まっている彼は

translation.en: and Chuks prowls the pavement like a hungry bear.
translation.ja: 飢えたクマのように 通りをうろつく

translation.en: Blessing is Chuks' last girl.
She's an orphan, and was abused by the state since she was a kid.
translation.ja: 孤児で子どもの頃から 虐げられてきた

translation.en: Broken, bruised and battered, Blessing cannot escape Chuks' grasp.
translation.ja: ボロボロの彼女は チュクスから逃れられない

translation.en: He has too much power over her, and she has nowhere else to go.
translation.ja: すっかり支配されているし 他に行き場がないのだ

translation.en: And the two of them seem to be an inexorable slow train to disaster.
translation.ja: ２人は不幸な道を 突き進んでいるようだ

translation.en: All right, all right!
Everybody come down!
All of you, out of the bus, now.
-Bring your bags down! -Get down!
Sheriff, get on and bring everyone out.
translation.ja: シェリフ 早く降ろせ

translation.en: Can't you all hear?
Bring your bags down now.
Bring your bags. Straight line here.
Line up, line up, line up.
-Take your bags over there to be searched. -Move!
translation.ja: 順番にバッグの中を調べる

translation.en: -Let them be searched. -All of you open your bags!
translation.ja: 分かったな？ 開けろ

translation.en: All phones here. Put your phones here. Okay, open it.
translation.ja: 全員 携帯を出せ 見せろ

translation.en: You can go.
From now till you get to Europe,
translation.ja: 今からヨーロッパに 着くまでの間―

translation.en: no more communication with anyone.
translation.ja: 外部との連絡を 一切 禁止する

translation.en: Move! You, move!
-Where is your phone? -I don't have a phone.
translation.ja: 携帯は？ 持ってない

translation.en: -Why are you lying? -I do not have a phone. Honest.
-Do you want me to slap you? -No, sir.
-Where's your phone? -I don't have one.
translation.ja: 携帯は？ 持ってない

translation.en: Open up!
Now that you're here,
translation.ja: お前たち よく聞け

translation.en: everyone must be quiet and calm. Quiet.
translation.ja: 全員 口を閉じるんだ 静かにしろ

translation.en: Move! We ask the questions, we answer the questions.
translation.ja: しゃべるのは俺たちだけだ

translation.en: Do you understand?
-I said, do you understand? -Yes, sir!
A.
B.
C.
C.
B.
A. Come.
A.
A.
Over here. B.
A.
-She is my sister. -What did I say earlier?
translation.ja: 妹なの 俺は何て？ 忘れたか？

translation.en: You better keep your mouth shut.
I do not who care she is.
You hear me?
B!
A!
A.
The last thing I remember, he was on top of me.
translation.ja: 覚えているのは 彼が私の上にいたことだ

translation.en: His breath was all in my face.
translation.ja: 彼の息が私の顔にかかった

translation.en: I tried to fight him off, but my body was not working anymore
translation.ja: 抵抗しようとしたけど もう体が動かなかった

translation.en: because of the drugs.
The doctor confirmed next day that I had been brutally raped.
translation.ja: レイプされたことが 翌日 病院ではっきりした

translation.en: There was no condom involved.
This is a well-known man. A politician.
translation.ja: 彼は有名な人物 政治家だ

translation.en: His name is Sir Phillip Ondaje.
translation.ja: 名前は フィリップ･オンダジェ

translation.en: This is what he does for fun.
He drugs women and he rapes them.
translation.ja: 女性に薬を飲ませて襲う

translation.en: You've reached Ehi. Drop a message after the tone.
translation.ja: エヒの電話です 発信音のあとに メッセージをお願いします

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: 発信音のあとに メッセージをお願いします

translation.en: Oh, my goodness, Òlòtūré. Where are you?
translation.ja: オロトゥーレ どこにいる？

translation.en: You need to come in. You need to come in immediately.
translation.ja: 今すぐ話がしたいんだ

translation.en: And please call me once you get this.
translation.ja: 折り返し かけてくれ

translation.en: -Why did they divide us into groups? -I have no idea.
translation.ja: なぜグループ分けを？ さあね

translation.en: I am worried about not being with my sister.
translation.ja: 妹と離れたから心配だわ

translation.en: That's not a problem, is it?
-Yes. -You don't understand.
She is not street-smart like me. I have to protect her.
translation.ja: 妹は私と違って 要領がよくないから― 守ってあげなきゃ

translation.en: Look...
She is a virgin.
Yes.
That's why Auntie Alero agreed to take her.
translation.ja: だから渡欧に加えてもらえた

translation.en: Auntie, there's some guy outside looking for Ehi.
translation.ja: ねえ 男の人が エヒを捜してるわ

translation.en: Sir, Ehi is not here. She and Linda moved out today.
translation.ja: エヒはリンダと一緒に 今日 出ていったわよ

translation.en: -Where are they right now? -I don't know.
translation.ja: 今 どこに？ 行き先は知らないわ

translation.en: And they didn't give me any notice. Now I have to find two new tenants.
translation.ja: 行き先は知らないわ ２人 補充しなきゃ

translation.en: So, you don't know--
I said, I don't know anything. Ask the other girls.
translation.ja: 何も知らない 他の子に聞きな

translation.en: -Customer, what's up? -Please, I am looking for Ehi.
translation.ja: お客さん 調子は？ 今 エヒを捜してるんだ

translation.en: Even when the bitch is not here, she is still ruining my business.
translation.ja: あの女は いなくても 私の邪魔をする

translation.en: -Please leave. -Please, do you know where she is?
translation.ja: 失せな 彼女は どこへ？

translation.en: You won't find her. They all left for Italy.
translation.ja: 捜してもムダよ イタリアに行ったわ

translation.en: -When did they leave? -They left this afternoon.
translation.ja: いつ発った？ 今日の午後よ

translation.en: Customer, you've fallen in love with a prostitute.
translation.ja: 売春婦を 好きになっちゃったのね

translation.en: I know your type, handsome. You're quick to fall in love.
translation.ja: 恋に落ちやすいタイプでしょ

translation.en: Here's what will happen. You'll follow me inside. I'll help you forget Ehi in a heartbeat.
translation.ja: ついてきな エヒを忘れさせてあげるわ

translation.en: Thank you.
You're rejecting a good offer. Thank you.
translation.ja: 私の誘いを断るとはね

translation.en: Are you looking for freebies? Is that why you're looking for Ehi?
translation.ja: “粗品”が好みだから エヒがいいの？

translation.en: Hi.
I know you read the stuff, but I can't talk right now.
translation.ja: 取材録を読んだのね でも今 話せない

translation.en: Just listen to me carefully.
-Okay. -I am one hour northwest away from Lagos.
translation.ja: 北西に― １時間の所にいる

translation.en: My last turn was at Agbara.
translation.ja: アグバーラで曲がった

translation.en: My sense is we're going to be here for the next few days.
translation.ja: たぶん― ここで数日過ごす

translation.en: Hey, hey. Listen.
We will come and get you.
Okay, but I have to go now.
translation.ja: 分かった　もう切らなきゃ

translation.en: I love you.
I have to go. Bye.
translation.ja: 切るわね それじゃ

translation.en: Posture is very important in Europe.
translation.ja: ヨーロッパでは姿勢が大事よ

translation.en: You'll need to stand up straight. You see how I'm standing?
